meanings.definition: Relating to or occurring during a Roman assembly or election.
meanings.sent1: The comitial gathering was filled with excitement as the Romans prepared to vote.
meanings.sent2: During the comitial process, the citizens of Rome came together to make important decisions.
meanings.sent3: The comitial atmosphere was so lively that even the statues seemed eager to participate.
meanings.sent4: The comitial spirit swept through the city like a powerful wind, influencing every decision made.
meanings.sent5: The comitial scene was painted with vibrant colors, symbolizing the unity of the people.
